author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO MAINTAINS CATEGORY 2 STRENGTH WELL EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ...KIKO MAINTAINS CATEGORY 2 STRENGTH WELL EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Sep 02 the center of Kiko was located near 13.8, -130.1 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO MAINTAINS CATEGORY 2 STRENGTH WELL EAST-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Tue Sep 02 the center of Kiko was located near 13.8, -130.1 with movement W at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
